cards.name: SKELETON KEY
cards.description: The key to open any door

effects.top_description:
You can open the Vault or Locked Safe without rolling dice. 
 If a haunt says you can attempt to open the front door of the house, you can open it without rolling dice.

cards.name: ROPE
cards.description:
Good, solid rope. 
 Should come in handy.

special_description: You can fall down from or climb up to the Gallery or Collapsed Room without taking damage.
You can use the Mystic Slide without taking damage (but you must still attempt a Might Roll to use it).
You can move from the Basement Landing to the Coal Chute.
effects.bottom_description: Using the rope doesn't count as moving a space.

effects.top_description:
Gain 1 Speed and 1 Knowledge now. 
 Lose 1 Speed and 1 Knowledge if you lose the Toy Monkey. 
 When you enter a room with an explorer or monster, roll 2 dice:
special_description: 1-2 The monkey attacks an explorer or monster in the same room. Roll a Speed 3 attack for the Toy Monkey.
0 The monkey attacks you. The player on your right rolls a Speed 3 attack for the Toy Monkey.
effects.bottom_description: The Toy Monkey is not destroyed if defeated.

cards.name:
DRIP... 
 DRIP... 
 DRIP...
cards.description: A rhythmic sound that needles at your brain.

effects.top_description:
Put the Drip token in this room. 
 Each explorer rolls 1 fewer die (minimum of 1) on all trait rolls while in this room.

cards.name: WEBS
cards.description: Causually, you reach up to brush some webs aside... but they won't brush away. The cling.

effects.top_description: You must attempt a might roll:
special_description: 4+ You break free. Gain 1 Might and discard this card.
effects.bottom_description:
If you're stuck, you can't attack, move, or use an item until you're free. One during an explorer's turn, any explorer can attempt to free you. (You can also attempt this roll.) A 4+ succeeds. Anyone failing an attempt can't move for the rest of that turn. After 3 unsuccessful attempts, you break free automatically on your next turn and take your turn normally. 
 When you're free, discard this event.

cards.name: ROTTEN
cards.description:
The smell in this room, it's horrible. 
 Smells like death, like blood. 
 A slaughterhouse smell.
